Text:
hey mate been downloading every single one of your torrents...

but it seems you forgot to seed the earlier ones... 

Can I request to please seed 'NOW! That's What I Call Metal 57'  ???

Please!!
Brilliant, I too seed your contributions to 10:1. There are far too many 'HIT & RUN' merchants out there. They have no idea what SHARING is. Please keep up the good work. Cheers. T.

@Phoenix III I put out quite a MHRC collection feat. issues 1 to 444.
As there is some stress involved in editing and seeding that huge amount of songs the next one should be due when we reach #500.
